documents.document: As I stood at my kitchen window waiting for the kettle to boil, a van for a company called Sap drove by. I then had a thought of a customer calling them and someone answering the call with, "Hello Sap, how may I help you?" Bit rude.
@ismelfunny @theirishjam I bottled it! ðŸ˜“ Next time....

Truly perturbed by the shortage of black 10 denier tights across town. Plz help.
Stop by @scoutessexst today, here until 6pm. ðŸ¤— https://t.co/wha3ZNMQtv

Last night I dreamt that Beck texted me and asked me to join him on tour. He didn't specify what he wanted me to do, however. The only specific detail I remember was that Avenged Sevenfold were the support band.
Just remembered that Ireland are playing France tonight. I can finally watch Giroud guilt free on da pitch. What a time to be alive and from Ireland.
@HanrattyDave https://t.co/6BSuCc3yQy

My mom has been so supportive towards repealing the eigth. I may be a little drunk from all of the post voting pints, but I'm so proud to have the mom that I do. I love my mom and I'm so happy to have such an amazing influence and pal in her.
No, I didn't think get the fright of my life when I accidentally thought that a hand dryer was a soap dispenser. You did. ðŸ˜©

I wonder if @beck, a man of style and enthusiast of Teddy's cuisine, has had a chance to buy himself a nice Irish made blanket from @scoutessexst whilst in Dublin. Would be a real shame if he didn't. They come in many Colo(u)rs.
The only reason I eat scones is to smoother them with jam and have a reason to consume copious amounts of jam.

Earlier a pal (CC @FionnualaJay) asked me what I was doing this evening. I told her I was going to a gig (Josh T Pearson) where the musician describes himself as "an urban cowboy." I wasn't lying. https://t.co/BerkGuy5Wj

Made my final appearance on @NoEncoreShow today because I have been banned by @HanrattyDave. I really enjoyed doing this episode with @FelixTandem and @ColmORegan1. It may, in fact, be my favourite episode of the show, ever.
